content: संश्रि {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To have recourse to, resort, fly to for refuge or shelter. {@--2@} To lean or rest on, depend on; न खलु बहिरुपाधीन् प्रीतयः संश्रयंते <ls>U. 6. 12</ls>; <ls>Māl. 1. 24.</ls> {@--3@} To attain to, approach. {@--4@} To obtain. {@--5@} To serve, wait upon. {@--6@} To join, unite with.
